Use this form to load a given master/system/test/graph/trace and all associated alerts from prod onto a dev server.

Load from raw json

This can be used if the any of above methods fail. The error page contains an URL which can be entered in the location bar. Save the result to disk and upload it using this form.

You can also manually construct the URL. The formats are:

  • HOST/dump_graph_json?test_path= TEST_PATH &num_points= NUM_POINTS &end_rev= END_REVISION
  • HOST/dump_graph_json?sheriff= SHERIFF%20NAME &num_alerts= NUM_ALERTS &num_points= NUM_POINTS

Raw json data file:
